Module.Content:
<script>
function SendMsg()
{
    window.frames['ifrm'].location.replace("https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m10!1m8!1m3!1d14561.35182328995!2d120.6717438!3d24.1598777!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!5e0!3m2!1szh-TW!2stw!4v1413424299697");
    gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
}
</script>
        <input type="text" id="T1" size="20">
        <input type="button" value="重調視窗" onclick="SendMsg()">
        <iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m10!1m8!1m3!1d14561.35182328995!2d120.6717438!3d24.1598777!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!5e0!3m2!1szh-TW!2stw!4v1413424299697" id="ifrm" width="600" height="550" frameborder="0" style="border:0"></iframe>
